pages.text: $(1)It should be possible to summon forth spirits using a Crucible. While one might imagine that simply releasing Soul would acomplish this, the truth seems, as ever, to be somewhat more involved. $(br2)It is my belief that certain spiritually important objects would aid such a process:
$(1)$(li)Skulls $(li)Lit Candles $(li)Paintings $(li)Brewing Stands $(br2)Additionally, the manner of the spirit summoned might be random; if so, it might be changed for the better with Mind Power.
$(o)A $(l:intro/curse)certain other power$(/l), naturally, would almost guarantee the summoning of a malicious spirit.$(br2)Not sure why you'd want to do that but, it's your call.
